Package seng202.group5.gui.invoice

Class ApplyDiscountController

  • java.lang.Object
    • seng202.group5.gui.GeneralController
      • seng202.group5.gui.invoice.ApplyDiscountController
  • public class ApplyDiscountController
extends GeneralController
    This Controller is for when the worker wants to apply a discount. A screen is opened controlled by this class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      ApplyDiscountController()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void add()
      Add the value in the pointField by 1.
      void all()
      Changes the textfield to add all available points.
      void apply()
      This method is called when the apply button is hit.
      void calculateSavings()
      Calculates how much money you're saving by using however many points are selected.

      Returns the money saved from the discount.
      int getPoints()
      Gets the points used in the discount.

      Minus the value in the pointField by 1.
      void pseudoInitialize()
      Initialises the screen by showing all relevant information.

      Sets the customer.
      void setCustomerSettings​(CustomerSettings newCustomerSettings)
      Sets the customerSettings.
      void setMaxPrice​(org.joda.money.Money tempMaxPrice)
      Sets the max price of the order to stop the discount from going into the negatives.

        public void all()
        Changes the textfield to add all available points.

      • calculateSavings

        public void calculateSavings()
        Calculates how much money you're saving by using however many points are selected.

      • apply

        public void apply()
        This method is called when the apply button is hit. Which applies the discount and closes the window. Unless the amount that is being discounted is more than the cost of the order. The it issues a warning.
